CustomField.description: If Status = Available Then True Is Open Else If Status = Registered Then True Is Open Else If Status = Commission Then True Is Open Else If Status = Closed Then True Is Open
CustomField.formula: (IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( os_Status__c ,'Available'), ISPICKVAL( os_Status__c ,'Registered DLD'), ISPICKVAL( os_Status__c ,'Commission'), ISPICKVAL( os_Status__c ,'Closed') ),True,False))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based On Status Display Is Open Checkbox
CustomField.label: Is Open
